subject: Golf
Automobile Racing
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Eastman Kodak Co. is ending its 22-year sponsorship in Nascar and putting more sports marketing dollars into professional golf. Kodak said the realignment fit better with a new effort to highlight its brand digitally, like on PGA Tour scoreboards. Kodak also wants to engage more customers overseas because 60 percent of its sales are outside the United States. Kodak said it would also end a four-year sponsorship of Penske Racing.
snippet: Eastman Kodak Co. is ending its 22-year sponsorship in Nascar and putting more sports marketing dollars into professional golf. Kodak said the realignment fit better with a new effort to highlight its brand digitally, like on PGA Tour scoreboards....
